entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0114.9563] Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Net with a value of 14,290,504 is not equal to the combined total of Assets and Liabilities acquired excluding Goodwill and Goodwill ( -4,091,441 + 10,199,063 ) with a value of 6,107,622.
These values should be equal.
